OzSTAR User Guide
  • Docs »
  • Linux tutorials

Linux tutorialsÂ¶

The OzSTAR Supercomputer uses CentOS 7 as the main operating system. We advise that you make yourself familiar with the Linux operating system and the use of command line before using the supercomputer.

You can find a comprehensive Unix/Linux tutorial on http://www.ee.surrey.ac.uk/Teaching/Unix/.

You can find a list of recommended Linux/unix books on the following link http://www.ee.surrey.ac.uk/Teaching/Unix/books-uk.html.
